extensionDescription.message: Membantu anda membuat kode QR untuk semua website atau tab yang anda buka.

browserActionButtonTitle.description: The title for the button, which opens the popup.

commandOpenQrPopup.description: Description of the hot key command to open the QR Code popup (by default with Ctrl+Shift+F10).

errorShowingMessage.description: When there is an error when showing the error/info/….

couldNotLoadOptions.description: When one or all settings could not be loaded.

couldNotSaveOption.description: When a setting could not be saved.

messageUndoButton.description: The text of a button that undoes the last action.

couldNotUndoAction.description: Shown when an action cannot be undone.

resettingOptionsWorked.message: Semua pengaturan di kembalikan ke asal lagi!
resettingOptionsWorked.description: The message shown, when the options of the settings were reset.

resettingOptionsFailed.description: The message shown, when the options of the settings could not have been reset.

couldNotReceiveActiveTab.message: Tidak dapat tab yang sedang aktif.

errorDownloadingFile.description: Error shown when a file could not be downloaded. Do not mention a file type or name, but just keep it general.

errorPermissionRequired.description: Error shown when a permission is declined and the thing the user triggered cannot be executed.

errorPermissionRequestFailed.description: Error shown when a permission request failed. This indicates a technical error and does NOT mean the user declined the permission.

errorQrCodeOverflow.message: Tidak dapat membuat kode QR, teks terlalu panjang.
errorQrCodeOverflow.description: Error shown when QR code cannot be generated due to overflow in input size.

requestDownloadPermissionForQr.message: Untuk melanjutkan mengunduh kode QR, kami memerlukan izin download.
requestDownloadPermissionForQr.description: Shown, when the user is asked to allow the download permission to save the QR code.

lowContrastRatioInfo.message: Kode QR anda mungkin akan sulit di baca oleh pembaca kode QR dikarenakan kode QR anda ber-kontras rendah.

lowContrastRatioWarning.message: Rasio kontras dari QR code ini mungkin terlalu rendah untuk dikenali oleh pembaca kode QR.

lowContrastRatioError.message: Warna kode QR dan warna letar belakang anda terlalu mirip.
lowContrastRatioError.description: The message shown when the color for the QR code and the background are equal

messageAutoSelectColorButton.description: The text of a button that sets a new color with a sufficient contrast.

tipYouLikeAddon.description: A tip shown to remind the user to rate the addon.

tipYouLikeAddonButton.description: Button for the tip shown to remind the user to rate the addon.

tipSaveQrCode.message: Apakah anda tau, anda dapat menyimpan kode QR nya?
tipSaveQrCode.description: A tip shown to get the user to find the save option.

tipSaveQrCodeLink.description: The link for more information for the tip on how to save the QR code image. This should go to the FAQ.

tipQrCodeHotkey.message: Ingat kombinasi keyboard untuk aplikasi ini ialah Ctrl+Shift+F10.
tipQrCodeHotkey.description: A tip shown to get the user to notice that there is a hot key.

tipAndroidQrReader.message: Firefox mempunyai pembaca kode QR yang sudah terintegrasi.
tipAndroidQrReader.description: A tip shown to get the Android users to make them aware that Firefox already has an integrated QR Code Reader/Scanner. See https://github.com/rugk/offline-qr-code/issues/160.

tipAndroidQrReaderLink.description: The link for more information for the tip about the integrated Android QR Code scanner. The current link should automatically redirect the user to their locale translation of the support article, so it should *NOT* need to be changed.

tipTranslateAddon.message: Jika anda dapat menggunakan bahasa lain, anda bisa membantu menterjemhakan aplikasi ini ke bahasa lain.
tipTranslateAddon.description: A tip shown to users that potentially speak another language to translate this add-on.

tipTranslateAddonLink.description: The link to a description of the translation service/way you can use.

tipDonate.message: Apakah anda menyukai aplikasi ini secara gratis?
tipDonate.description: A tip shown to get the remind them of a donation.

tipDonateButton.message: Bantu kami mengembangkan aplikasi ini dengan ber-donasi.
tipDonateButton.description: The button of the donation tip taking the user to the donation site.

tipLearnMore.description: The common button for tips, where you can get more information on click.

tipHowToUse.description: The common button for tips, where you can get more information about how to use a feature just presented.

textareaPlaceholder.message: Masukan teks disini untuk mulai membuat kode QR.
textareaPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the textarea, when it is empty.

contextMenuItemConvertSelection.description: The context menu entry shown for generating QR codes from a selection.

contextMenuItemConvertSelectionAccessKey.description: the context menu entry shown for generating QR codes from a selection with an access key.

contextMenuItemConvertLinkSelection.description: The context menu entry shown for generating QR codes from a selected link.

contextMenuItemConvertLinkSelectionAcces.description: The context menu entry shown for generating QR codes from a selected link with an access key.

contextMenuSaveImageCanvas.description: The context menu entry shown for saving PNG images (from a canvas) in the popup.

contextMenuSaveImageCanvasAccessKey.description: The context menu entry shown for saving PNG images (from a canvas) in the popup with an access key.

contextMenuSaveImageSvg.description: The context menu entry shown for saving SVG images in the popup.

contextMenuSaveImageSvgAccessKey.description: The context menu entry shown for saving SVG images in the popup with an access key.

someSettingsAreManaged.message: Beberapa pengaturan dikelola oleh administrator sistem anda dan tidak dapat diubah.
someSettingsAreManaged.description: The message, which appears, when settings are pre-defined (as managed options) by administrators.

optionIsDisabledBecauseManaged.message: Opsi ini dimatikan, karena di konfigurasi oleh administrator sistem anda.
optionIsDisabledBecauseManaged.description: The title (tooltip) shown, when hovering over a disabled, managed option.

optionLearnMore.description: When a link to an explainer needs to be added, this is the link text.

optionsResetButton.description: The button to delete all current settings and load the defaults, shown in the add-on settings.

titleGeneral.description: The title for the general settings group.

titleQrCodeSetting.description: The title for the qr code settings group.

titleAddonBehavior.description: The title for the addon behavior settings group.

optionPopupIconColored.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings.

optionPopupIconColoredDescr.message: Perlihatkan ikon yang telah di warnai, dan bukan ikon hitam/putih di status bar.
optionPopupIconColoredDescr.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings. It describes the optionPopupIconColored setting in more details.

subtitleQrCodeSize.description: The heading/grouping title shown for the radio buttons for the size setting of the QR code.

optionQrCodeSizeFixed.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings. It is one option for selecting the QR code size.

optionPixelAbbreviation.description: The abbreviation of the term 'pixels'. In most cases, it may stay as it is in English.

optionQrCodeSizeAuto.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings. It is one option for selecting the QR code size.

optionQrCodeSizeAutoHelper.message: Kebanyakan berguna di perangkat mobile, dimana kode QR dibuka di tab baru.
optionQrCodeSizeAutoHelper.description: Helper text for the optionQrCodeSizeAuto making the user aware that this setting will likely have no or little effect on desktop devices.

optionQrCodeSizeRemember.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings. It is one option for selecting the QR code size.

subtitleMisc.description: The heading/grouping title shown for the miscellaneous setting of the QR code.

optionQrQuietZone.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings. It's about the area around the QR code.

optionQrQuietZoneStatusSingular.description: This is the number of empty/'white' modules around the QR code in its singular form.

optionQrQuietZoneStatusPlural.description: This is the number of empty/'white' modules around the QR code in its plural form.

optionQrQuietZoneDescr.message: Jumlah modul garis batas di sekitar kode QR, diwarnai di warna latar belakang.
optionQrQuietZoneDescr.description: The description of the quiet zone option.

optionQrQuietZoneDescrLink.description: The 'Learn more' link in the description of the quiet zone option.

optionQrCodeColor.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings.

optionQrCodeBackgroundColor.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings.

optionErrorCorrection.description: Error correction setting for QR code. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_code#Error_correction.

optionEcLow.description: Option of error correction level for QR code. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_code#Error_correction.

optionEcMedium.description: Option of error correction level for QR code. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_code#Error_correction.

optionEcQuartile.description: Option of error correction level for QR code. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_code#Error_correction.

optionEcHigh.description: Option of error correction level for QR code. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_code#Error_correction.

optionErrorCorrectionDescr.message: Nilai ini mengindikasikan berapa banyal kode yang boleh dihilangkan, dan masih dapat terbaca oleh pembaca kode QR.
optionErrorCorrectionDescr.description: The description of the error correction option.

optionErrorCorrectionDescrLink.description: The 'Learn more' link in the description of the error correction option.

optionAutoGetSelectedText.message: Gunakan teks yang diseleksi di halam website secara otomatis.
optionAutoGetSelectedText.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings.

optionUseMonospaceFont.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings.

optionDebugMode.description: This is an option shown in the add-on settings.

optionDebugModeDescr.message: Ini hanyak berguna untuk mendapatkan detail dari log output di konsol untuk pelaporan bugs, dan lainya.
optionDebugModeDescr.description: The description shown for the debug mode (optionDebugMode).

translatorCredit.message: Aplikasi ini telah di terjemahkan ke Bahasa Indonesia oleh $TRANSLATORS$.
translatorCredit.description: The credit text for the translator. See https://github.com/TinyWebEx/common/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#translator-credit-inside-of-add-on for how to translate this.

translatorLink.description: The link to the translator's GitHub profile.

translatorUsername.description: The username that the translator wants to be referred to.

contributorsThanks.description: Text thanking all contributors and linking to the contributors file.

contributorsThanksLink.description: The link to the CONTRIBUTORS file.

contributorsThanksLinkText.description: The link text linking to the contributors file. See contributorsThanks.

dismissIconDescription.description: the aria label for the close button of the message box

ariaMessageLoading.description: the aria label to label the message box as an info message box

ariaMessageInfo.description: the aria label to label the message box as an info message box

ariaMessageSuccess.description: the aria label to label the message box as an success message box

ariaMessageError.description: the aria label to label the message box as an error message box

ariaMessageWarning.description: the aria label to label the message box as an warning message box
